name: Bloom Echo
description: The name of the game is simple: Find a way out of the maze in record time.

name: Lucky Shot
description: It is often said that luck is the key to success.

name: Dark Throne
description: Awaken as a knight in this 2D Metroidvania platformer. Explore, unlock abilities, and battle foes to escape a treacherous dungeon.

name: Leap Year
description: Leap Year is a clumsy platformer about knowledge and discovery. Explore a compact, hand drawn world filled with hidden paths. Understand the game’s secrets to reach new areas and collect all the pages of your calendar.

name: Proyecto infernal
description: Infernal Project offers a real survival challenge. Survive in a toxic volcanic arena. Face random enemy waves, collect scarce resources, and make strategic decisions to stay alive. Test your endurance and see how long you can last in this intense survival simulator.

name: Phantom Dash
description: Phantom Dash is an open world 2D Platformer where you must collect Coins!

name: Roberto el Lagarto
description: Take on an exciting stealth mission as Roberto the Lizard, a cunning thief. Use special abilities to avoid enemies while you steal valuable treasures in a museum full of challenges.

name: Monster Battle
description: 《Monster Battle》 is an exhilarating combat and survival rogue game. Grow stronger in battle, collect and purchase powerful artifacts and equipment to fight against stronger monster.

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 2
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Bumper Kitty
description:
Bumper kart
GO GO GO!

name: Fastival
description: Race through an enchanting carnival and be on the lookout for wacky obstacles and cool shortcuts as you compete against up to three other friends in this cute and cartoony arcade racing game!

name: HD
description: Hongdu is a real dream that the developer happen in school when he was a young, because a dream developed this micro-puzzle game many years later. Independent pixel puzzle click game, the game is developed in Unity

name: Cryohazard
description: Cryohazard is a spooky turn-based strategy rogue-lite. Pilot an upgradeable train caravan into the depths of the hazardous Soul Storm. Fight off the angels that give chase.

name: Naive Novel
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Demon Subquest: Sakura Cinders of the East
description:
Additional content that will grant access to the subquest "Sakura Cinders of the East".

In this quest, players will be able to take on "Konohana Sakuya", and even recruit her should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted at least halfway through the game.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Demon Subquest: Holy Will and Profane Dissent
description:
Additional content that will grant access to the subquest "Holy Will and Profane Dissent".
In this quest, players will be able to take on "Dagda", and even recruit him should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted at the end of the game.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Digital Deluxe Edition bundles the base game with all purchasable DLC content including three Mitama items and two Demon Subquests.

name: A Fascinating Story
description: A fascinating story is a strategy development game. You will play the protagonist to improve your abilities, earn money, work and become rich! Buy gifts at the same time to guide five female characters with different styles and characteristics. As the game time progresses

name: Unfolded Cube
description: Let's solve a scrambled cube in its unfolded state. Manipulate the cube pieces of a randomly mixed cube to solve it.

name: Harem Survivor
description: How long can you be single? Resist the hordes of suitors, and those with the help of various special abilities and skills that will allow you to hold off and fill with love, all your pursuers and thus become a true "Harem Survivor"

name: Spicy Fruit
description: A fruit merging game with a spicy twist!

name: Froggy Bouncing Adventures
description: Jump into a bouncing adventure to save Froggy’s best friend! 60 levels of leapfrogging platforming and hat collection!

name: Habitatrix
description: A water physics puzzle variety game.

name: I Know Your Address
description: A collection of five short, silly games, following in the footsteps of those cheap games you impulsively gift to a friend and then immediately forget about. Speaking of which, I think I found the perfect gift for anybody whose address you know...

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance
description: Embark on this definitive version of the critically acclaimed Shin Megami Tensei V, massively expanded with a brand-new storyline featuring new locations, demons, and choices to make that will dictate the fate of all existence.

name: Monster Hunter Stories
description: The first installment of the Monster Hunter Stories series is back and coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, and PlayStation 4! Become a Monster Rider and hatch, raise, and battle with your favorite Monsties in this epic RPG adventure.

name: Wolf Peak: The Case of Ruth Choi
description: In 1991 Ruth Choi was murdered and it was whittled down to 6 suspects, but the case was never solved. Watch interviews, go through evidence and build your case. A game where you are never told outright who the killer is. Use your own deductive skills to find out, who killed Ruth Choi.

name: Survival Guide 2
description: A survival narrative puzzle game. A linear game with a comprehensive and rich storyline. Offers three distinct gameplay styles: stealth, direct assault, and strategic intelligence.

name: Survival Advanced
description: Welcome to the archipelago! Here, you are free to do as you please, but be cautious... some islands are full of danger. To protect yourself, explore, build your shelter, arm yourself, and conquer your enemies.

name: Don't Shout Together
description: If you utter a sound, you and your team are doomed. Keep your cool for 30 minutes to flee this ominous forest by contacting the Rescue Crew.

name: FireChess
description: Unleash a new level of chess tactics with mage pieces that create fires, fog of war, portals, freeze opponents, and much more. Strengthen your army by purchasing additional pieces (standard or mage) when you earn income from occupying gold spaces.

name: 14 Minesweeper Variants 2
description: Minesweeper but the rules are changing, again.

name: Chill Seekers
description: Slide your penguins to safety in this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Mountains of Madness
description: A first person horror exploration game set in the frozen wastes of Antarctica. Use your tools to navigate the frozen galleries untouched by millennia and unearth evidence of a dreadful truth while you search for a madman whose ill fate lies somewhere beneath these Mountains of Madness

name: The Heroes Around Me
description: The Heroes Around Me tells a story of a family of 3: the hard-working and quiet father – Nan, his daughter Lili, and their pet dog Sesame. Players will experience the harshness and warmth in the simpler time of the 1990s, where lots of stories are untold.

name: Astro VR
description: Freely travel among the stars and planets in this VR only astronomy simulation. Experience space from some of the smallest solar system bodies to the largest stars. See planets, moons, asteroids, trans-Neptunian objects and, of course, thousands of stars and their exoplanets.

name: Kien
description:
An enthralling action platformer infused with RPG elements, immersing adventures in a captivating fantasy world of 23 intricate and demanding levels. With Gameplay that maintains a relentless pace, throwing players into the midst of frenetic action where they must confront a multitude of adversaries. The distinctive non-linear structure grants you the freedom to explore Kien's expansive world as you choose; Journey from one stage to the next, making every playthrough a unique and captivating adventure.

Kien also holds the world record for the most delayed video game, 22 years.

name: Legend of Mortal
description: The game world is set in a turbulent state and the mighty Tang-Man declines. The threats from the old enemies keep coming one after another.As a nobody, will you choose either to leave yourself out of it or to fight for Tang-Man's future and turning the tide? The journey of yours,is unpredictable.

name: Drunk or Dead 2
description: Immerse yourself in the virtual nightmare of Drunk or Dead 2, a post-apocalyptic VR world where you and your crew fight to survive against a nearly endless zombie horde with the help of a little booze and a whole truckload of high-powered guns.

name: SunnySide
description: Find harmony in the Japanese countryside as you help Sparky uncover lost memories in this modern take on the farming and life simulator. Build a thriving homestead, cultivate new relationships, and chase your own happiness in SunnySide.

name: Fallen Aces
description: The A.C.E.S. Watchful guardians of Switchblade City. Being taken down, one by one. Now it's up to one man, with two fists, to get to the bottom of it all. Fallen Aces is a crime noir FPS that plays right out of the '90s and looks right out of the comics.

name: Plant Therapy: Plush and Pots Pack
description: This packs adds 75 new plushes and pots and display shelving to the game! Decor galore!

name: Among Us VR: Limited Time Pack - DUM Duo
description: Deliver masked justice with this dynamic duo — the Vigilante Hat and Vigilante Gloves! With great power comes great responsibility… to look fearsomely fashionable.Vigilante Role not guaranteed. Does not include comically epic low voice or cape.

name: Among Us VR: Glove Pack - Catch Deez Hands
description: The Catch Deez Hands Pack includes 3 pairs of gloves for your wardrobe: Foam Run — This one's for the biggest fans only. Smooth Operator — For a formal night out or a secret agent expected to die... Git Gud Gloves — Cheat codes not enabled when wearing these retro-style gloves.

name: Who is the Defendant: Deliberately Rough
description: "Who is the Defendant" is a mystery genre visual novel. Players take on the role of a prosecutor, investigating a case involving "a game with rudimentary art published on STEAM."

name: You VS Drugs: Education & Prevention
description: 'The Enemy' can enslave anyone, anywhere. By taking on the role of real-life Agents who exist in our brain and embarking on an adventure that will defy your imagination, you will be empowered to better protect yourself, and the people you love —if you have what it takes!

name: Disney Speedstorm: Season 8 - Journey of Emotions
description: The “Journey of Emotions” season, inspired by Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out, brings a memorable adventure and content to the game, including the brand-new Riley's Mind racing environment! Racers Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness are revving up their engines to take you on an emotion-filled racing challenge.

name: Kingdom Hearts III + Re Mind
description: KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind (DLC) brings one chapter of the series to a close. Travel to exciting new Disney and Pixar worlds, and prepare for the final showdown.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 5 - Drilling Deeper
description:
Hello Miners, Welcome to SEASON 05 - DRILLING DEEPER!
Management’s got their sights set on mineral riches deeper down toward Hoxxes’ core, which means we’re increasing your depth of operations. You’re venturing down deeper than ever before, claiming unprecedented treasures for the company, and confronting all the lethal horrors that stand in your way.
In other words, it’s another great day at work.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - A Dance of Masks
description: A Dance of Masks is the sixth and final premium DLC for Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous in Season Pass 2, one last love letter to the Knight Commander and their loyal companions

name: Trainz 2022: ProTrain - AC4400CW Loco Bundle 1
description: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz 2022: Model Trainz - Freemont Mills
description: Model Trainz: Freemont Mills is inspired from the Jan. 2024 issue of Model Railroader by Steven Otte. While small, there are plenty of operations that can be performed which can turn into a challenge.

name: Trainz 2019: Model Trainz - Freemont Mills
description: Model Trainz: Freemont Mills is inspired from the Jan. 2024 issue of Model Railroader by Steven Otte. While small, there are plenty of operations that can be performed which can turn into a challenge.

name: Trainz 2019: ProTrain - AC4400CW Loco Bundle 1
description: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: ProTrain - AC4400CW Loco Bundle 1
description: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - Freemont Mills
description: Model Trainz: Freemont Mills is inspired from the Jan. 2024 issue of Model Railroader by Steven Otte. While small, there are plenty of operations that can be performed which can turn into a challenge.

name: Train Simulator: EA-692
description: A Romanian rail icon arrives from developer Train Motion.

name: Solridge
description: Solridge is an educational video game aligned with third-grade Common Core competencies. As the player, you will obtain gold by helping the townsfolk with their problems. If you want to save the village from disaster, you must continue gathering gold and growing stronger!

name: Garden Paradise
description: "Garden Paradise" is a casual and relaxing game that you can freely design your ideal garden by dragging and placing various units. The game offers a wide variety of unit types and you combine these elements to create unique garden layouts.

name: Guess the Flag!
description:
Embark on a global journey with the game “Guess the Flag!”

Test your knowledge of 255 countries, islands and international organizations in 6 addictive modes. Test your memory by matching the flag to the name of a country or play the reverse mode. If you are already an expert in flag knowledge, you can try the mode in which you have to write the name of the country yourself. Feel the thrill of matching locations to a country and, for a change, immerse yourself in the unpredictable random mode that combines all the challenges.

name: Crystal Cliffs
description: This is a medium to hard difficulty single map mixing up puzzles and small scale slaughter

name: For Honor: Master Katashi - Orochi Hero Skin
description: Be Master Katashi and protect the Seion Bridge with a legendary katana fabled to contain the strength of an entire army.

name: .If All The Lonely Nights.
description:
.if all the lonely nights. is a game based on a personal experience, one that happened to myself one early morning in the spring of 2024, in Malaga.

Dealing with whatever feelings have always been difficult for me—even if they are not necessarily unpleasant or sad—and, to my surprise, I have found in video games a way to channel this pressurized stream of complex thoughts.

If at any time you feel overwhelmed by the emotions that certain situations generate in you, I encourage you to try to create something with all of that. Although it doesn't have to be a little game, redirecting all that expressive power into a creative exercise can be a wonderful way to let off steam.

name: Neon World Maker
description: Neon World Maker is a platformer and game creation system. Players can design their own levels and maps using the editor and share with friends.

name: Puzzle Box: Animals
description: Experience the thrill of solving puzzles in the animal world! Choose from a variety of puzzle sizes to challenge your skills with two game modes.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Summer Sailor Uniform Set: Blue
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 4
description: There’s a storm raging over Fortnite Festival! James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich, Kirk Hammett, and Robert Trujillo from Metallica are the Icons of Season 4.

name: Undesired Harem: Harem Nanka Nozondenai!
description:
A sudden harem situation?!
His heart must decide between 4 beautiful girls!

name: Princess Dress Up
description: Design amazing looks for your princess and stand out with endless combinations of dresses, hairstyles and accessories. Your creativity has no limits!

name: Reasoning of Courage Nori Courage Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: A Fragile Mind
description: A Fragile Mind is a compact first-person point and click mystery adventure game chock-full of puzzles, secrets, and questions.

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Star Luster
description: "VS. STAR LUSTER" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1985. The player uses the Star luster “G.A.I.A” to fight the invader “Battura” who is trying to cause a big bang. Defend your base from enemies by switching between Map Mode, where you choose which enemies to attack, and Combat Mode in the battle space.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Midŋighţ Skin - Elyrioŋ Tribe
description: Sin descripción

name: Turmoil
description: Turmoil is a 3D isometric top-down action roguelike game. Inspired by a dieselpunk aesthetic, navigate a winding factory space filled with environmental hazards and hostile robot workers with the goal of survival. Rise from the ashes! Show the boss that a worker is more than their mechanical parts.

name: The Finals: Season 3 Starter Pack
description: The Season 3 Starter Pack bundle includes: - 3 Legendary Weapon Skins - Season 3 Sticker - 1 150 Multibucks

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! 1+2
description: Sin descripción

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Live Emotion
description:
“Uta no Prince-sama” Live & rhythm game by 18 idols!

You can enjoy 3DMV's brilliant performance, a rhythm game that anyone can enjoy, and stories depicting the various appearances of idols.
Go to the exciting stage!

name: Ronin's Requiem
description: In Ronin's Requiem you play as a ninja who has fallen from grace and now, to regain his honor, he has to eliminate an army of demons in a foreign land. Ronin's Requiem is a fast-paced platformer with solid gameplay and fast-paced combat.

name: For Honor: The Muramasa Blade
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom Hearts Integrum Masterpiece
description: Experience the full story of KINGDOM HEARTS! The journey begins in KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- as Sora, Donald, and Goofy battle the Heartless, making friends and having spectacular adventures along the way. The story culminates in KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind, where our heroes take on tremendous challenges and persevere against the darkness threatening iconic Disney and Pixar worlds.

name: The Finals: Season 3
description:
Season 3 was the third season of THE FINALS. It launched on June 13, 2024, and ended on September 26, 2024. It was revealed on June 7, 2024, at Summer Game Fest. The season followed a predominately Japanese theme.

This season was sponsored by ENGIMO, introducing the all-new arena Kyoto and the tournament series World Tour, alongside OSPUZE, which sponsored the OSPUZE Expo, and DISSUN.

New content introduced in Season 3 includes:
- Arena: Kyoto
- Game Modes: World Tour, ranked Terminal Attack
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: Recurve Bow, Dual Blades, Spear
- Gadget: Thermal Bore
- Specialization: Winch Claw
- Progression: New career levels
- Team text chat on PC

name: Knight Fall
description: Welcome to Knight Fall, where every move is a challenge! Battle bosses as you climb through dangerous lands. Be careful; a single wrong move could mean the end of the journey. Will you beat the horrors or fall to the bosses on your daring quest?

name: Neon Squad Tactics
description: An electrifying turn-based tactics experience where you, your friends and online allies work together to complete missions for the powerful corporations using a captivating holographic table, projecting part of your consciousness into a cybernetic team of heroes called 'NEON Squad'.

name: Eggconsole Sorcerian PC-8801mkIISR
description:
Dragon Slayer, the fifth installment in the Dragon Slayer series, continues to enjoy enduring popularity.
Embark on an adventure into a world of swords, magic!

name: Shrineflow
description: Shrineflow is a multiplayer (1 vs 1) hide-and-seek game between a Kitsune and a Ninja. The Kitsune uses her magical abilities to track down her opponent. The Ninja uses his stealth skills to stay undetected while he collects enough to coins to break into the treasure trove.

name: Xonix
description: Remake of a classic old-school hit, one of the first arcade games ever!

name: Rota: Kurofune
description: A Portuguese merchant who goes by Vasco looking for wealth in foreign lands tries to start business with Japan, he must fight pirates and earn the trust of the Japanese for his business to grow and prosper. However, the Japanese have reason to believe that the merchant is also trading with the Chinese, Vasco must try his best to hide this fact to not cause conflict. He isnt the only portuguese merchant in Japan, as other merchants may try to stop Vasco, going as far as sending assassins after him. Can Vasco surive this struggles while staying in the good side of the Japanese?

name: First Law
description: Escape the ice caves of Europa and return home in this retro inspired 2D sci-fi platformer. Journey through ice caves using Newtonian physics.
The game consists of finishing several levels, solving by clicking with the mouse or using the keyboard to complete the tasks.

name: Minimalist Tower Defense: The Last Tower
description: After the Battle of the Britain, the war to eliminate geometric creations continues Mount Fuji, Cape Storm, Bering Strait, New York And the ultimate goal: the South Pole...

name: Tipsy Woods
description: Enter a pixelated nightmare as you navigate a haunting forest in search of 8 bottles, all while evading a relentless monster. Can you survive the terror and escape?

name: Momochiyo's Mononoke Taji
description: Ninja Puzzle Battle

name: Truncheon Titties
description: A Dark Medieval Porn game centered around exhibitionism, big ole titties, abuse of authority, blowjobs, spanking, bullying and revenge. Join the Royal Guard and fight against the criminal scum. Make your choice to show your tits or swing that truncheon!

name: Hyperspace
description: This is a hardcore 3D detective/puzzle game. You will play as SU, a person from the future, who travels through wormholes across multiple timelines to solve puzzles, gather clues, and use deductive reasoning with the collected clues to uncover the truth.

name: Beyond The Walls
description: Immerse yourself in a 3D tower defense game set in a medieval realm. Build towers with unique effects and strategically manage your town to amass resources. Master the elements and devise cunning strategies to triumph in this captivating fusion of defense and city management.

name: Bite Night
description: Bite Night is a comedic first-person horror game that explores the idea of what if the big bad monster was bad at their job of being scary.

name: Age of Privateer
description: Age of Privateer is a real-time card battle-based roguelike deck-building game. Combine various cards to create a powerful deck and explore the vast seas. Can you uncover the secrets hidden in the ocean and find the ancient treasure?

name: Smile Simulation
description: Psychological-surreal-analog-survival horror game. Find the smiles and get out.

name: BomberHit
description: BomberHit is an action-packed multiplayer game where you defeat your opponents by detonating bombs. Think strategically, develop tactics, and conquer your adversaries in labyrinthine battles! Engage in combat with friends or online players and fight to become the ultimate bomber!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Order of the Deep Pack
description: The Order of the Deep DLC grants you the armor of this venerated dwarven mining guild. It's your turn to represent the Order, plunging ever further into the perilous depths.

name: Perfect World
description: Perfect World is an anti-capitalist art platformer. It is an environmentalist parable that subverts player incentivization and proposes that a sustainable future exists if we declare “I have enough.” It is a hallucination, a dream, a nightmare.

name: Light Reforged
description: Light Reforged features Baldr, the god of wisdom and light, as he travels the Nine Realms to rid the world of technology that was designed by Loki and is slowly bewitching the realms. Exploring vibrant and technological worlds while defeating a variety of opponents.

name: Charming Hearts
description: "Charming Hearts" is a real-life interactive dating game. Players will meet, get to know, and fall in love with different types of beauty. Every choice will lead to a completely different chemical reaction with "her"; every entanglement, the sweet love is entangled and pulled.

name: Four Second Forever
description: You have four seconds to dress a chinchilla as a cowboy, plug in a USB cable, pluck extra legs off a horse, and jump a pit of spikes with a frying pan

name: Akairo Mansion: Horror Edition
description: A complete version of the well-received free game “Akairo Mansion - Horror Edition” is now available with additional episodes! A dramatic horror novel presented to sound novel lovers by the author who is a sound novel lover.

name: Sex Counselor
description: I have never been in a relationship until I was 20! As a college student, I dreamed of a pink relationship and received help from a counselor. However, beyond the pink color, I saw red color as well. Let’s capture their hearts and discover their fantasies together!

name: Melvor Idle: Into the Abyss
description: Discover a new dimension to Melvor Idle as you descend into the Abyssal Realm! Encounter new challenges, unique environments and mechanics while mastering new Abyssal Skills. As you delve deeper, the stakes get higher… but will you rise to glory?

name: Ardency: Heart of the Rebellion
description: A fantasy otome game full of love, friendship, and betrayal. In the heat of war, will your love turn the tides of battle?

name: Gabenwood 2: 99 Hidden Euros
description: New challenges for the fan of hidden object puzzles! Be our hero! Go to the parallel Universe and find all anomaly to save the Gabenwood from destruction!

name: The Last Tiger
description: In the game "The Last Tiger," you will control the fate of four tank commanders during World War II! You will participate in the most bloody tank battles of the Second World War.

name: Boxing Go
description: Welcome to Boxing GO: Where Champions Rise! Get ready to play the electrifying clash of boxing in the ring as Boxing GO brings you the most thrilling boxing matches.

name: Monster Hunter Stories Collection
description: A compilation of the HD port of Monster Hunter Stories and Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin.

name: Willy's Wonderland: The Game
description: Willy’s Wonderland: The Game is a 2.5D beat ‘em up game based on the cult film of the same name, in which a group of Animatronics come to life and slaughter people who dare visit Willy’s Wonderland.

name: The Snare
description: The Snare is a single-player crime and horror game. Atlas follows clues sent by the killer to rescue his wife Samira. While trying to find out the reason for Samira's kidnapping, he encounters surprising facts.

name: Taskmaster VR
description: Submit to the judgement of The Taskmaster in glorious virtual reality! The hit TV show comes to VR and YOU are the contestant. Step into the world of Taskmaster, endeavour to complete a menagerie of challenging and extraordinary tasks and get creative in how you solve them. Your time starts now!

name: Minecraft: Tricky Trials
description: Tricky Trials is an update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition filled with daring adventures and surprising rewards. Hunt for the trial chambers, and take on the challenge that awaits you in this sprawling copper structure. Fight off unfamiliar foes like the bogged and the breeze in your hunt for an elusive trial key! Then unlock your reward from the vault, a block that makes adventuring fun for every player, no matter the size of your party.

name: Ad Fundum
description: Take control of a giant mech and embark on a riveting dieselpunk adventure in a vast subterranean world. Dig deep, collect minerals, upgrade smartly, explore diverse locations, unfold ancient secrets, and try not to explode! Will you save the world or vanish in the depths below?

name: Cooking Simulator: Sushi
description: Start a new culinary challenge and run your own sushi bar in one of Japan's cozy street food districts.

name: Minecraft: Tricky Trials
description: Tricky Trials is an update for Minecraft: Java Edition filled with daring adventures and surprising rewards. Hunt for the trial chambers, and take on the challenge that awaits you in this sprawling copper structure. Fight off unfamiliar foes like the bogged and the breeze in your hunt for an elusive trial key! Then unlock your reward from the vault, a block that makes adventuring fun for every player, no matter the size of your party.

name: Messy Up
description: "Messy UP" is a cute multiplayer game where pets destroy homes to grab the owner's attention. Due to the owner's busy schedule, they lack time for their pets. Players control the pets or play as the owner to catch them in this delightful mischief-filled game!

name: Project VTS
description: Project VTS is a real-time TD game. You'll need to build your defence around your base and defend against different enemies from all directions in various terrains of the alien planet.Use your turrets, obstacles, power supply, resource facillities to defend your base.

name: Withering Way
description: Every thousand years the balance between order and chaos is lost, it is then that the gods choose one to return to the land of Wicklan and walk the Withering Way. You've been chosen to return to your body 68 years after your death to save the souls of those who condemned you to a fate they now face.

name: Unsupervised
description: You and your friends were the sidekicks of the world’s greatest heroes. But now that they are gone, will you pick up their mantle or tarnish their legacy?

name: Love Birds
description: Get them cats! Play alone or join your friends to kill every last cat, but that's not your only enemy. All those forest freaks are gonna be out to get you. Explore the many different biomes and rescue your imprisoned fellow birds! Build a bird army!

name: Dryft City Kyngs
description: Work, race, explore, chill, repeat. Become the ultimate Dryft Racer in a colourful 2D punk-cartoon world based on a very near-future Melbourne!

name: BlackForge VR
description: Forge and form a wide variety of medieval weaponry in this creative-based weaponsmithing simulator! Support the local heroes with tools to ensure their success in combat. Embrace the power of the aesir and thunder away at the forge to make your imagination a reality!

name: Imperius
description: Imperius is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master space RTS with a lore-rich campaign. Command devastating ships of the Imperius Navy and prove your loyalty by destroying everything in your path, no matter the cost.

name: TFC: The Fertile Crescent
description:
The Fertile Crescent is a Real Time Strategy game set during the Bronze Age in the Ancient Near East.

Inspired by the rise and fall of Bronze Age civilizations, you must manage the delicate balance between food surplus and the maintenance of your army.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
description: The Clone Wars has you deep inside the battles of the Old Republic through 16 missions, piloting a range of vehicles including speeder bikes, Republic Gunships and fighter tanks as well as the weapon of the Jedi, your lightsabre, for close combat. Whereas the Rogue Squadron series concentrated on aerial battles, The Clone Wars contains almost all ground battles. You must fight as Anakin Skywalker, Obi Wan Kenobi, Mace Windu, and others throughout the game to prevent the Confederacy from gaining a deadly weapon. Multiplayer options are also included for up to four players with game types including deathmatch, conquest, and a co-op ground and vehicle survival mode.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Chomp Challengers Pac
description: Make an impact with these rare cosmetic items as you attempt to chomp any challengers standing between you and the title of Chomp Champ!

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Clash Pack
description: This pack contains 2 cosmetic items for use with the VDV faction and 1 cosmetic item for use with the USMC faction.

name: Brawlhalla: Ezio Starter Pack
description: Become an Assassin and an Asgardian! Perfect for newcomers to Brawlhalla. Claim this starter bundle which includes: - Ezio Legend Unlock - Asgardian Ezio Skin - 140 Mammoth Coins Over $15 value for only $4.99!

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 3
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Lily got herself a new yoga instructor to train her and help relieve her back pain, but James has other things in mind.

name: Elemental Cube
description: "Elemental Cube" takes you on a challenging and thought-provoking journey through a magical world. This single-player puzzle game consists of 50 unique levels, each requiring players to overcome obstacles with strategy, logic, and creativity. At the heart of the game is a mystical cube, with each face representing one of the four fundamental elements: fire, water, earth, and air.

Wherever You Hike is our first Smol Dreamers project, a bite sized game made in 10 weeks taking you on a little hike and canoe exploration.

There is no goal, no timer, no pressure. We just want you to take a break from the noise of life.
Explore the lake, its forests and their smol secrets, find a good place to camp and enjoy the vibes.

name: Holbrook Hotel
description: Holbrook Hotel is an atmospheric horror game about the killer in Holbrook Oaks. After hearing a noise in the neighboring hotel room, you start a short adventure around the town. Escape the man, and get to safety, if there is any.

name: Final Fantasy Adventure DX
description: A full colorization of Final Fantasy Adventure for Game Boy Color version. Also includes a new world map and many bug fixes.

description: This Snow Day Pack includes 26 wintery Clothing Items, 2 wintery Wigs, 8 wintery Furniture Items, 1 wintery Mount, and 1 wintery Pet.

name: DanceDanceRevolution World

name: Truck Parking Simulator VR
description: Truck Parking Simulator VR is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive parking experience. But also an open world where you can deliver goods by truck. The game has one of the best truck physics simulations in VR.

name: Persnippety

name: Loser Simulator
description: The game "Loser Simulator" invites players to plunge into the life of an ordinary person named Bari, for whom everything goes awry. We have to help him overcome a series of failures and ridiculous situations in one day.

name: Otherworldly Ossuary
description:
Don't give up skeleton! Fight your way out of space purgatory.
You are already dead, but everything here wants you 7 feet under.

Otherworldly Ossuary﻿ is a small MBF21 single map with cramped puzzle-like combat.

name: Room of Lust: Android Pack
description: Android girls have joined. There are 19 android girls in total! With a combination of 6 hairstyles, 6 hair colors, and 3 skin types, you can enjoy a total of 2052 variations! Please enjoy the android voice, which is different from the voice of a real person.

name: Room of lust
description: Which girl are you having fun with tonight? A total of 19 heroines! With a combination of 6 hairstyles, 6 hair colors, and 3 skin types, you can enjoy a total of 2052 variations! Enjoy being naughty with a girl alone in a secret room.

name: Fallen Knight: Rebellion of the Fallen + Fallen Knight: Rise of the Fallen
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley - Deluxe Edition
description: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Skyrim and Fallout 4, welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers—chosen from the nation's best and brightest - emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story.

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley - Lost Treasures Bundle
description: Uncover items from Vault 63 with the Lost Treasures Bundle. Fallout 76 base game required, sold separately.

name: Draconic Resurgence
description: Dragonic Resurgence is a metroidvania where you have to explore different locations, collect upgrades and fight different bosses.

name: Lost Chiko 2
description:
The 2nd game in the Lost Chiko series, this time with a different adventure, a different story and a different gameplay!
One day while we were sleeping under a tree, a bird comes and tells us that our mother has been kidnapped.

name: Aliens, Plasma Guns & Chewing Gum
description: An ancient alien race only mentioned in the Necronomicon has arrived at our doorstep and started abducting people from around the globe. Humankind is threatened and our only real hope of defeating the enemies is a specially trained group of soldiers with a peculiar taste for advanced weaponry and green glowing chewing gum.

name: Kayak VR: Mirage - Soča Valley
description: Explore the beautiful Soča Valley in Slovenia, known for its iconic green water, mountain vistas and lush nature. Take on a new thrilling challenge by paddling down whitewater rapids or explore the nature of this serene valley at your own pace.

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley
description: Expand southward to Skyline Valley – a brand-new region of Appalachia. Investigate the cause of the electric storm circling overhead and unveil the mystery around Vault 63 and its dwellers, including a shocking new Ghoul type – The Lost.

name: Coin Eruption
description: Experience the thrill of a mountain-top coin pusher game in Coin Eruption! Drop coins, collect special upgrades, unlock rewards, and trigger epic volcano eruptions. Customize your game with avatars and backgrounds while leveling up through dynamic and exciting gameplay.

name: Devils Run
description: An indie platformer and race to escape an imploding planet! Time your moves carefully..

name: Fandom
description: "Fandom" is a psychological horror game played through a girl obsessed with celebrities. It explores the dark side of stalking and shows that obsession goes with terrible consequences.

name: Word On The Hook
description: An exciting intellectual fishing game, where as a “fish” you need to catch words and earn coins!

name: Gasping.2
description: GASPING.2 is a single player survival game, a dangerous and abandoned game world where only you and your companions exist. If you can tolerate loneliness, then explore it, which requires patience.

name: Funky Rock Hoppers
description: Jump, dodge and flap yourself out of danger as a funky rockhopper. See what distance your penguin can reach while dodging various objects as well as sharks, birds and UFOs!

name: ZomGoBo
description: ZomGoBo is a shooter game where the goal is to increase character skills and escape from the dungeon. Once the character is fully built up, the high-score mode is unlocked, where the objective is to achieve as many points as possible.

name: Lesson Learned
description: Help Frank travel through history in this unique approach to the tower defense genre. Enter a bizarre daydream world in co-op or solo mode. Gather resources, build defense towers, and manage your minions.

name: Leap 'n Bump!
description: A sexy platformer, now with an extra game expansion. Solve the underground tunnels mystery and help the Endless Forest in the extra content!

name: DummyDoodle
description: Developed, drawed and song created by one. Try to eliminate Final Bosses and complete levels.

name: Cucumber
description: Cucumber is a clicker Game, in which you click a Cucumber! In Cucumber you click the Cucumber to gain even more Cucumber!

name: Airplane
description: An indie game where the goal is to defeat as many waves of enemies as possible, or have fun and weaving through buildings.

name: Eternal
description: Eternal is a first-person survival horror shooter where the player is trapped in a sinister mental asylum filled with terrifying entities. Your goal is to unravel the dark secrets of the asylum as you fight to escape this nightmarish place.

name: AutoBulletSurvivor
description: Jump into the world of AutoBulletSurvivor! Survive on a post-apocalyptic surface devastated by nuclear war. Collect items, evade powerful enemies, and gather supplies for the underground shelter. Grow stronger with each run and experience the thrill of survival.

name: Bug
description: Bug is an action clicker game where you just smash pesky bugs and DO YOUR PART! Have you been taken out of action or not allowed to protect SuperDuperEarth? Welcome to the planet Drake, where you can destroy bugs from a remote drone turret FOR FREEdom!

name: InstaTok Tycoon
description: "InstaTok Tycoon " is a blogger simulator in the Tycoon genre that immerses you in the exciting world of digital marketing.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Rated Gold Superstar Pack
description: AEW: Fight Forever Rated Gold Superstar Pack features the legendary Adam Copeland along with the all new Fright Forever Haunted Forest map AND 30 additional skins. All of this PLUS seven new moves including finishers and taunts.

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Old Acquaintances
description: Vagrus – The Riven Realms: Old Acquaintances, introduces two new Companions with new abilities, individual and specific loyalty quests that explore their own stories, new enemies and rewards, as well as newfound additions to hirelings that can join owners of the DLC.

name: Ensnared
description: Play as Z as you investigate her partner's recent disappearance from her position at Z's side as an FIB agent. Yet, be prepared to face the horrors your friend and her endeavors have unleashed.

name: Shoko
description: Capture and battle hundreds of different monsters to complete your bestiary. Shoko is a game with waves of enemies to defeat and Roguelite elements in a cute, colorful, hand-drawn universe.

name: Office7
description: A guess-the-difference game modeled after an office hallway.

name: Cuboyd
description: Control a cube and solve puzzles! Learn to master the power of equipping items on your six colorful faces.

name: The Little Baby
description: Once upon a time, an orphan named Mary was left on the door step of a humble mouse family's home. She was raised as a mouse, but one fateful day she met the mysterious Edgar, who changed her life forever. This is a love story of Mary and her first love.

name: Atan
description: Atan is an action-adventure game where you traverse a massive colossal. Use your climbing skills together with your bow and anchors to journey over the massive giant. But beware, because this rough terrain contains many challenges, for the colossal itself is still alive and in need of your help.

name: Whacking Hell!
description: The gates of hell have opened: whack all the monsters before they whack you! Collect their souls, ramp up your weapons and your spells, and become a slaughtering machine in this frantic roguelite top-down 2D shooter!

name: Mystic Mischief
description: Fly as Mammon the chaotic thieving bird as he attempts to achieve the biggest heist of his life. Poop, caw, and steal your way through his adventures. Avoid the dangerous dragons as they try to keep you from stealing their treasures.

name: Master of Chess
description: Make the right moves and become World Chess Champion! Develop your skills and opening repertoire in this chess player management game. Apply the right strategy to win matches and climb the rating ladder to become the best chess player the world has ever seen.

name: Zion Survivors

name: Dear Mom: My Letter to You
description: Follow the emotional story of Ayame Kawasaki, who disappears from the public eye following her mother's suicide. One year later, she's ready to start her life again. Build and develop meaningful connections with those you cherish in this slice-of-life/social simulation game.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Maria
description: Sin descripción

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Hands
description: Sin descripción

name: Eve Online: Equinox
description:
The rejuvenation of nullsec has begun! New Upwell structures are now available to corporation and alliance leaders, to shape sovereign space in their image, and pilots can fly new defense-capable industrial ships into a new era. Creative capsuleers are empowered to design personalized ship SKINs for themselves or their organization and tackle new and improved goals and Corp Projects. In addition, the biggest update to EVE Vanguard since December is coming in the Solstice event, introducing a new map, weapon modifications, and more.

This update includes:
- New feature: SKINR Ship Personalisation (custom ship SKINs)
- New structures: Orbital Skyhook, Sovereignty Hub, Metenox Moon Drill
- Major changes to Nullsec Sovereignty, iHubs and TCUs
- New Upwell Haulers: Squall, Torrent, Deluge, Avalanche
- Carrier balance reworks with new modules: Capital MJD, Capital MJFG
-- New carrier-based Faction fighters
- Daily Logins replaced by Opportunities/Daily Goals
And more

name: Metaball: Blazing Pack
description: 7 fiery and fabulous Legendary outfits! The Blazing Pack is a great deal! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss out!

name: EVE Online: Equinox Era pack

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
description:
This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Tomb Raider: Legend, playable on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.

Follow Lara Croft down a path of discovery as she travels the globe to remote, exotic locales in search of one of history's greatest artifacts that unleashes unwelcome figures from Lara's mysterious past. With guns blazing, Lara must use her athletic ability and intellectual wits to explore vast, treacherous tombs, riddled with challenging puzzles and deadly traps. Experience an adrenaline-fueled adventure in Tomb Raider: Legend!

name: Cowboy Duel: Red Wild West Massacre

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 1

name: Battle Babes: Love & Death

description: Sin descripción

description: Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.

name: Blind Quest: The Ivy Queen

The "free-build" mechanism transforms individual creations into adventures, blending creativity with exploration.

description: ‘Island Uncanny Story’ is a narrative-driven simulation and survival game where you play as a young graduate who boards a flight to Vesia Bay with five women of different professional backgrounds and personalities. However, the flight is forced to make an emergency landing on an island。

The mightiest mammal to ever rocket to stardom is back in a three-game, Carbon Engine-powered collection that includes:
- Rocket Knight Adventures
- Sparkster: Rocket Knight Adventures 2
- Sparkster

Homelander, the ultimate patriot and leader of The Seven, descends upon Mortal Kombat. As a narcissistic sociopath with an insatiable need for validation, love and power, Homelander unfolds a new Era of tyranny in Mortal Kombat 1.

This pack includes playable character Homelander, from 'The Boys', including all new movesets.

Homelander is a guest character based on Antony Starr’s appearance as the character in the television series.

This game adapts a real story that is happening right now (June 2024) in the building of Primado Reig Avenue number 101-103, in Benimaclet, Valencia, Spain.

But if it weren't about that building, I could go on any other.

Take the role of the veteran scav Walker as he guides a team of elite soldiers into The City. As events spiral out of control Walker finds out that a long forgotten foe has caught up with him... and that not all injuries are of the flesh.

name: Light Snake
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Josh Powlison's Button: Mildly Remastered Edition
description: Press a button. Increment a number. Change reality. The instant classic returns for a mildly remastered electric boogaloo on modern computer systems. Once again experience the euphoria of button pressing with Josh Powlison's striking developer commentary to guide you.

name: Closed Galaxy: Wata Tsumi yori Ai wo Komete
description: "There's Something on This Spaceship" An SF horror mystery adventure game depicting a life-or-death struggle against an alien that imitates your crewmates.

name: Roku and Rei
description: Dive into the world of Roku and Rei, a puzzle game where the protagonists move in reverse directions! Use their ability to interact with color-coded objects and tackle mind-bending challenges.

name: Gallery X
description: "Will you be the next one to get out of here alive?" GalleryX, a horror game that focuses on observation and memory.In the dim environment, there are more than 60 anomalies, 2 endings, different experiences,waiting for you to explore.Please watch out for enemies.

name: Shiling
description: The protagonist "Luo Ling" travels following vague memories in her mind, during which she discovers a child "Wuyi," who claims to be pursued by monsters and seeks help. They agree to stick together and find home.

name: Surgit
description: In the dark corners of virtual reality, where nightmares merge with reality, lies Surgit a heart-pounding horror experience that will test your courage and survival instincts. Step into the abyss, where every shadow hides a malevolent force, and your only chance of escape is to fight back.

name: No Work No Life
description: This game is a roguelike horror game. Beyond the door lies a completely white space where you must pick up items, offer them as sacrifices, and survive for as long as possible.

name: Loop: ClassRoom
description: Every school has some terrifying rumors, and you certainly don't want to be a part of these rumors.

name: Guns Demons
description: Get ready to dive into explosive action and pure adrenaline with Guns Demons, the vehicular combat game that redefines the genre. In this thrilling universe, cars don't just race—they're armed with a devastating array of firearms, ready to unleash chaos on the road.

name: Interwoven Emotions
description: Indie narrative puzzle platformer where you follow the character along their journey of defeating emotions and finding purpose.

name: Kidnelis
description: Truths, lies & imagination. Improve your short term memory, understanding, concentration & literacy skills. Read, choose, replicate and more importantly: when in doubt, discuss!

name: Apples And Bananas
description: Embark on an epic fruit-filled adventure as Jack the Apple, battling brainwashed banana soldiers in this top-down 2D pixel shooter to stop Dr. Banana's evil plans!

name: Forge Simulator
description: You are trapped in an endless labyrinth. You must find hidden resources scattered throughout the labyrinth to craft your own sword. Overcome the dangers of the labyrinth with your crafted sword, survive, and escape.

name: Reincarnated as a Rookie
description: Reincarnated as a Rookie is a game of fighting monsters and leveling up. Users can obtain resources through quests to purchase and build equipment, trap pets and grow!

name: Code Of Superheroes
description: A strategic turn-based game where you play a superhero in a randomly generated world. Battle villains, play side games and experience many different adventures with lots of choices and variation.

name: Medical Diagnostic Simulator
description: Play as a general practitioner in this text-based medical simulation game. Consult, examine, and diagnose your patients in your own medical practice.

name: Shade Silver
description: Avoid Traps, Shoot Enemies, Collect Treasure, Discover Secrets, Solve Puzzles, Beat Bosses, Unlock New Places.

name: PRV: Poultry Red-fox Viper
description: Enter the untamed world of PRV! Pick your side —Chicken, Fox, or Snake— and engage in a fierce multiplayer battle. Coordinate with teammates, and seize bonuses. Will you dominate the food chain? Join now and let the hunt begin! 🦊

name: Anomalous Deception
description: A PSX-retro-style first-person survival horror game that takes place in a underground bunker that is randomly generated for each playthrough! Discover its secrets and mysteries of what led you down there in the first place.

name: Beater: Apocal Undone
description: Apocals have taken over the earth. Fight through hordes of Darklings in this roguelite/survival setup to cleanse the world of these apocalyptic creatures. Beater not only allows you to choose powers for your character but for the enemies as well.

name: Trap Yuri Garden
description: Traps in motion at long last! Trap series creators Aogiri Penta and Nishida Hajime bring us another exciting title, a cross-dressing yuri love story that will shatter its readers sense of values into a thousand pieces!

name: Potty Knight Saga
description: Player WANTED For hazardous journey, bitter condition, long months of complete darkness, constant danger, safe return doubtful, honor and recognition in case of success. The controls are simple. But this game is the pinnacle of the challenge" "Does this game look cute?"

name: Desktop Hacker: Echoes of Pandora
description: Desktop Hacker - Echoes of Pandora brings you into the intriguing era of early 2000s hacking. In this expansion, uncover a hidden digital conspiracy using your hacking skills and the mysterious Pandora hack. Each step takes you deeper into a captivating story set in the world of cyber espionage.

name: Escape From Hata
description: What will happen if a person is overtaken by a global catastrophe during his daily routine? You can find out right now.

name: Thrasher
description: Thrasher is a mind-melting cosmic racer and an essential audiovisual experience. Swoop, dash and thrash across the void, taking on wild bosses in a race for survival that begins at the dawn of time.

name: Metal Ape
description: Metal Ape is a 2D souls-like metroidvania game where you play as a cyborg exploring a treacherous world filled with deadly enemies and dark secrets. Master brutal combat, wield powerful abilities, and journey deep into the abyss in search of the truth.

name: Cats Hidden Around the World
description: Find 1500 cats hiding in over 15 iconic locations such as Rio de Janeiro, Istanbul or Tokyo in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Anna: The Magic of Words
description:
The magic of words gave you everything and suddenly took everything from you.

A little sad and disappointed you make your way through a dangerous world. Embark on the difficult journey through the jungle, icy landscapes and dangerous caves. Collect scrolls and combine their words, face your fear and the ticking clock.

But whatever happens, never forget your most important goal: find Anna.

name: Ghostware: Arena of the Dead
description: Ghostware is a retro-fps combining the lore-heavy plot and exploration of adventure games with the fast action of '90s shooters. You and other ghosts have been trapped inside an arena FPS created by a wizard's unwillingness to overcome his nostalgia. Escape the past, shoot your way out.

name: Microbrewery Tycoon
description: An economic strategy dedicated to microbrewery management. Your craft beer should become famous all over the world!

name: Crash Dive 2: East Indies Expansion Pack
description: Includes one campaign, two new mission areas, three new ships, one new plane, and more!

name: Red Planet Rampart
description: You are deployed to the desolate red planet to reforge humanity's hope. With no hospitable atmosphere, no nurturing water sources, only relentless storms, unknown alien creatures, you must use wit and determination to survive on this alien land and build a Mars base of your own.

name: 100 Aliens Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Aliens Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: Burning Out
description:
Burning Out is our third-semester academic project and the team's first game. Based on humanitarian causes relating to mental health, we propose introducing the public to Burnout Syndrome and its consequences in people's lives.

In it, you'll follow part of the story of Nula, a character with no defined gender who faces the daily demands and inconveniences imposed by greater São Paulo in order to achieve her greatest dream.

name: Case Zero
description: Case 0 is a short horror game where you try to escape a deranged, all consuming beast as it hunts you down.

name: Roller's Escape
description: Roll, flip, and problem-solve your way through this geometric platformer. You play as a cube that can change into a sphere to roll through levels to reach a goal. Overcome obstacles and reach the finish line. Will you rise to the challenge?

name: Project Juggler
description: FPS/Task Management Action Game

name: Photochemistry
description: Photochemistry is a challenging 2D puzzle game about synthesizing chemicals to sustain plant life in a post-apocalyptic setting. Design and construct elaborate mechanisms to produce complex compounds from simple particles.

name: Diablo IV: Vessel of Hatred - Expansion Bundle
description: Prepare to unleash the next chapter of Diablo IV with Vessel of Hatred and uncover what evil lies ahead in the continuation of the critically acclaimed action-RPG.

name: Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest 3
description:
Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest 3 is a Classic Mega Man Level Design Contest turned into a fully-fledged fangame, and the largest one yet!
Clear the contest entries, explore the hub worlds and witness the overarching plot unravel as you soak in the game's myriad of content!

name: Foot Clinic: Smelly Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Neon On!: Bright Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixelitos: Spritle Royale
description: A creature-collecting teambuilding autobattler with over 130 unique elemental creatures to collect and battle with! Assemble a team of Pixelitos to face opponents in 6v6 auto battles. Face off in online asynchronous multiplayer, online versus with friends, or in the single-player campaign.

name: Dark Destruction
description: This is an open world role-playing game with a medieval magical background, requiring players to explore. You can defeat invading enemies or lead followers to defeat evil leaders. Monster camps, wilderness bosses, dungeon dungeons are full of adventure and passion.

name: Singalongsong
description: Singalongsong is a simple rhythm game that takes players through her daily life with fun levels, lively hand-drawn animations, and delicate original music.

name: Moccoletti
description: Prepare for chaos on the stage tonight when a game of Moccoletti starts! Lead a merry chase through the gardens, hiding in the dark to protect your candle while using your fan, snuffer or blow-dryer to blow your friends away in Moccoletti: a 2-4 player arena shooter with wind instruments.

name: Pyradice
description: Challenge your friends in building the pyramid! Can you judge the greed of your fellow players correctly? Only then will you become the next ruler of Pyradice!

name: Craft Archeology Simulator: Pyramid to Polar
description: Explore ancient wonders, dig deep, and rewrite history with every discovery, become a legend in the world of archaeology!

name: Hentai Oppai
description: Hentai Oppai is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Bully Ball Soccer
description: A minimalist, multiplayer game where you are Bully, the only ball in the world who can play soccer. Host or join sessions for quick, laid-back matches with friends or strangers. Roll, jump, fly, and dash your way to victory in this simple physics based soccer extravaganza. (Good connection required)

name: 100 Aliens Cats
description: 100 Aliens Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Aliens themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of aliens places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: Fog of War: Book One
description: Fog of War is a romance, story focused adult visual novel. You play as an Ex-Delta Force operator attending medical school upon retirement. You make choices that shape the story and potential romances.

name: Pixel Cat's End
description: Pixel Cat's End is a virtual pet site where you collect and manage a village of cat-like creatures. You can dress them up, give them jobs, build and decorate their homes, and take them on tabletop-rpg-style adventures.

name: Construction Machine Simulator: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Greed
description: This is a tower defense and RPG game, harvests resources, explores the world, finds new towers, collects rare material, builds and updates towers, and defends against monsters. But the more resources you harvest, the stronger the monster.

name: Project: Gorgon - Extra Character Slots Pack
description: Need "alts" for crafting, storage, or exploring other gameplay modes? This will add three more character-slots to your Project: Gorgon account.

description: - Game Description Combine awesome skills to win against waves of enemies! Skill Random Defense is a casual defense game that combines 60 skills to block enemies. Combine the optimal skills using the skills you have.

name: McDoomguy's Slaughterific Sample Platter
description: Welcome to McDoomguy's! What can I get you? You're not sure? Well then, might I interest you in our Slaughterific Sample Platter? It's our award-winning 42-course meal crafted by a selection of chefs, world-famous veterans and new tryouts alike. Oh ﻿right, you probably wanna know what the entire gimmick here was. Well, the ﻿participating chefs had a selection of 12 different design restrictions on offer, of which they had to use at least ﻿3﻿﻿.

name: Lost Phoenix
description:
In a world paralyzed by pandemic and unrest, a dark plot is being set into motion. A terrorist group known as the Absolvers, lead by the evil TALBOTT, are plotting to throw the city into chaos. The only ones who can stop them are a sword-wielding amnesiac named Isaac and a gun-toting femme fatale named Layla. Together, they must fight their way across the city to stop the Absolvers and resolve their own personal conflicts with the group.

Based on the award-winning indie actioner Lost Phoenix.

name: One Room Nightmare
description: Turn-based strategy horror. Terror in a confined space. Manage your limited power and time to protect yourself from the oncoming enemies and survive until dawn.

name: Frogfall
description: A platformer featuring 40+ levels where you play as a hungry frog.

name: Cazzarion: Coin Pilot
description: Sin descripción

name: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame
description: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame is a puzzle and adventure game where you progress by rotating square-shaped worlds. Your main character is a cube and you have to overcome different challenges in each level.

name: Pretty Coo'
description:
Lost and alone in an unfamiliar town square, I guess it's time to make friends with the local wildlife!

By feeding and guiding your feathered friends, you'll overcome various obstacles to make your way back home, and maybe even cause some mischief along the way!

name: Cadoom
description: Be a true warrior in this FPS doom clone game. Destroy evil enemies and find cakes at every level to finish game

name: FindIt: Bonus Maps 1
description: This DLC includes another 5 special maps, extremely cool and beautiful, which will make you love the game even more, and a few more new objects to look for.

name: FindIt
description: Try to find all the hidden objects, left clicking on them to collect them. The goal is to find all the objects to finish the level, or the episode.

name: Because The World Died
description: Retro pixel art role-playing game in a harsh and dark world, focused on survival and understanding your past. Why? Because The World Died. Features include nonlinear plot with many viable endings, dark humor and text-based combat (no animations).

name: Kittentegy
description: Are you ready to accept the challenge and stand up for the delicious cheese? In the Kittentegy game, you have to stop the mice from stealing the cheese from the houses. Your strategic skills and decisive actions will be the key to victory!

name: Delivery Drop
description: Solve the puzzle and delivery the toy

name: Lost Estate Agent
description: Lost Estate Agent - is a survival horror game a real atmosphere of abandoned mansion.

name: Scrabbleman
description: A word puzzle game that combines elements of Hangman and Scrabble.

name: Fest Guests
description: Open world one man survival game. Save your hometown from alien invasion - other people are abducted. First fight with simple weapons until you get alien technology. The battlefield is every street, shop, office, apartment, subway, etc. in a highly interactive city.

name: Odyssey of the Explorer
description: Single player Hack and Slash casual sci-fi

name: Droid Wars
description: Droid Wars is an action-packed game with local multiplayer deathmatch and single-player survival modes. Customize your droid’s loadout, manage health, armor, and stamina, and battle in PvP and PvE environments. Survive waves of enemies or be the last droid standing.

name: Flying Frogs
description: A hilarious multiplayer game where up to 4 players compete to survive as a fly. Outsmart your opponents, use strategic flight maneuvers, and become the top fly in "Flying Frogs"!

name: Sex, Stocks & Cocks
description: SEX, Stocks & Cocks is an exciting visual novel for adults that immerses you in a world of intrigue, fraud, and sexual passion. As the protagonist, you will find yourself in the midst of a large stock brokerage firm, where everyone hides their secrets and motivations.

name: Collective Unconscious
description:
Collective Unconscious is a collaborative, multiplayer game that draws inspiration from Yume Nikki and its fangames. You control Minnatsuki, a mysterious character wandering around a dream-like world full of spirits and otherworldly beings.

The game is exclusively made for an online multiplayer experience, and hosted under the Yume Nikki Online Project server.

Discover new worlds, gather collectibles, and share a unique experience with your friends across the spirit world!

name: Pooool
description: Pooool is a small, pool-inspired physics puzzler where you combine balls of similar sizes to create even bigger ones, all while trying to save room for more. Chase your hi-score, share scores with friends, and master your flinging skills!

name: NudGirls
description: NudGirls is a big collection of riddles and puzzles. You are going to explore various worlds and meet incredibly beautiful girls. Pass the test using your intelligence. Undressed charming bodies and no clothes on. Would you like to receive your reward?

name: The Fanciful Chronicle
description: The Fanciful Chronicle is a singleplayer first person narrative game. As Mike, you find yourself at a highschool reunion where all kind of memories return to you as you meet your friend Sam. As you explore these memories, Mike discovers more and more about his past - or lack thereof.

name: The Legend of Azarias Rebirth
description: Embark on a thrilling journey as the Angel Raphael in this action packed 3D first-person dungeon crawler. Conquer 24 unique floors, battle menacing demons, and undertake challenging side quests to amass power to save the girl Sarah.

name: Anomaly Escape
description: In Anomaly Escape, you're on a spaceship with activated self-destruct. Navigate Corridors 0-10, watch for anomalies, solve puzzles. In multiplayer, teamwork is crucial for survival and saving the ship. Beware: failure means restarting from Corridor 0.

name: Pixelgroove
description: Embark on "Pixelgroove," a one-of-a-kind shmup adventure where your chosen music video's visuals and beats transform into exhilarating gameplay. Each video's distinct imagery directly influences the game's dynamics, crafting an experience unique to every song.

name: Dragon Is Dead
description: Dragon is Dead is a hack-and-slash, roguelite action platformer. It offers tons of customization fun with different character skill trees and legendary equipment. Overcome repeated deaths to defeat Guernian, the leader of the Dark Dragons.

name: Alan Wake II: Night Springs
description: The dark and haunting world of Alan Wake II broadens further with the release of its first major expansion Night Springs. Dive deep into the surreal territory of the fictional TV show 'Night Springs' and embark on quests that are as bizarre as they are thrilling.

name: The Amazing Crackpots Club!
description: The Amazing Crackpots Club! is a fast-paced, action-packed magic duel in a 2D arena, where wizards throw powerful spells trying to destroy the opponent’s pots, while using mobility and defensive abilities to protect their own pots from incoming attacks.

name: Karen's Fault
description: Join Karen in her uphill battle. But remember, there will be a lot of anger in this adventure...

name: Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge
description: Foster a sanctuary for frogs and restore the biodiversity of the wetlands in Kamaeru, a cozy farming sim where you raise frogs by playing mini-games and decorating your habitat. Hop right to it!

name: OnlySociety Midgard Imperial
description: Recruit hero's and defeat the opponents in Medieval environment. Equip different weapons and perform combo to turn down your enemies. The platform is huge enough and avoid jumping down the cliff.

name: Glory Hunters
description: Glory Hunters is an innovative action-adventure RPG designed for the original GameBoy. It introduces a distinctive and original gameplay twist: progression is driven by earning achievements.

name: The Palace on the Hill
description: An open-world adventure, exploration game where you tend to your farm, talk to villagers and collect stories from them to make beautiful Indian miniature inspired paintings in your own unique way.

name: Tracks of Thought
description: A self-exploration game that uses the power of psychology, personality tests and cute bugs to help you better understand yourself and others. Discover where you belong on a train bound for an unknown destination.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD Randomizer
description: Randomizer mod for the Nintendo Switch remaster of Skyward Sword.

name: Tokyo Cooking: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Narrow Woods Hotel
description: A retro point-and-click horror adventure game that tests the boundries of the genre! In this "found-footage" horror game you have to navigate the rooms and hallways of the mysterious Narrow Woods Hotel. Collect keys and items and use them to find your way out.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 10
description: Season 3 Episode 10: Walk on Forever! Cody hangs out with Peter and Mini as they collect yearbook signatures from every person in Hella City!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Custom Molded Ultra Skin Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Pocket Pusher: The Citadel
description: "The Citadel" a level made to improve the core mechanics of Pocket Pusher, includes new collectibles.

Bring Me that Shawarma – Supporter Pack includes:

Bonus episode “Shawarma Snuff” (WILL BE AVAILABLE JULY 2024)
High-resolution arts
Artwork and photos without post-processing
History of the project creation with comments from the developers
Infinite love from the authors
New episodes will be able to come out faster!

description: Bifröst skin for Jötunn class

description: Bifröst skin for Viking class

description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: No Recollection: Swimsuit DLC!
description: This DLC will allow you to enable swimsuit outfits for the main cast! You can finally live out the fantasy of seeing them half naked!

description: Open Hearts on Fire is a crossover short form special of the Open Heart and Hearts on Fire series.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Paradise Parks
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Amusement Park themed tables that will take you for a ride!

name: Dominance Chess-like
description: Turn-based strategy game where the players use their game pieces to gain control of the fields of a chess board one move at a time.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character Pass
description:
The Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character Pass includes 4 characters as they are released, Outfit 1 colors 3-10 for those characters and 4200 drive tickets.

The characters included are M. Bison, Terry, Mai and Elena.
Terry and Mai from Fatal Fury will be the first guest characters to appear in the main Street Fighter series.

name: Snake Crossing
description: Classic snake game with modern rules and infinite exciting. Play alone or with friends to fight against AI.

name: Retro Wave
description: Retro Wave is an endless runner in which you have to avoid various obstacles in order to achieve the highest possible score. Compete with other players worldwide on a global leaderboard and become number 1.

name: Magic Cube in Strange World!
description: Welcome to Magic Cube in Strange World! You're a cube, you've got a grappling hook, and your goal is to reach the top of this strange course.

name: Time is Life
description: Explore Islands and the ocean in a Singleplayer or a Coop adventure. Relaxing gameplay, music and hundreds of unique activities to do. Whether you are an Explorer of the unknown, a Farmer that wants to tend to thousand of crops or someone who enjoys combat through boss battles. This game is for you.

name: Psychopath Massacre
description: George Dinescu kidnapped you in his home in Romania. Get out alive while utilizing a V.H.S camera to film everything that happens inside. Torture, murder, and dismemberment take place inside the house, exposing the frightening legacy of a serial killer's decade of terror.

name: Morituri Te Salutant
description: It's time to test your mettle in a Grecco-Roman-ish single adventure map, Morituri Te Salutant! Doomguy has found himself summoned to an ancient, crumbling villa - the court of the Red Emperor. The Emperor is conspicuously absent, but he and his cronies watch with great interest from afar as you rip and tear your way through his tests. Will you make it through the trials, or will you be split from nose to navel? Play and find out.

name: Call of Honor: Duty of Warfare & Battlefront Trench Warriors: Ops of Warfare
description: CALL OF HONOR - DUTY OF WARFARE Key Features: 1. Tactical Mastery: Assume the role of a skilled operative and lead your team through heart-pounding matches against a relentless enemy force. 2.

Customize your saltwater tanks with the new Great Barrier Reef tank background and sand substrate. Care for the Giant Manta Ray, Red Handfish, Chinese Pufferfish, and Sunflower Sea Star!

name: Fridge Escape
