name: Sentry System
description: Sentry System is a tower defense roguelike where you collect, modify and upgrade your sentries while progressing through a network of challenging encounters.

name: Survive In Ankara
description: Welcome to Survive in Ankara! Are you ready to defeat the creatures that attack you, either with your friends or alone? I'm sure you can overcome these creatures with 5 customized characters. Join this adventure and destroy all creatures on 5 different maps

name: Awagame
description: Explore the world's oceans with a sea turtle that has the ability to inflate bubbles! Bubbles can be used as bullets or shields. But be careful not to over-inflate the bubbles and suffocate! Watch your timing and jump out of the water to breathe. Turtles are lung-breathers.

name: Rider's Spirits
description: Are you ready to display your riding skills?

name: Horatio: Connector 13
description: Akio's accidental encounter with "Horatio’s Life" leads to a mysterious journey intertwining his past with a parallel world. Unravel secrets, confront otherworldly threats, and uncover the truth in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Don't Find Me!!
description: Dive into horror with Don't Find Me!!, where your mission is to survive by collecting 6 books while avoiding the lurking monsters. Keep your cool and your flashlight on to hope for escape. Are you ready to face your fears in this terrifying nightmare?

name: Darknesssssssssssssssss
description: This game is a medieval survival game. Defeat the enemies hiding in the castle. Actively use your shield and roll to avoid the enemy's attacks and exploit the opponent's loopholes to defeat the enemy.

name: Crying Crystal
description: 1: A 3-d character game. 2: Experience the passionate fun of killing monsters. 3: Getting a large number of crystals can improve your ability. 4: Role level up obtainning the corresponding skills.

name: Coal Road
description: This is a horizontal shooter game. The story takes place in a city infected by "coal", where most people have become coal zombies. When the government learned of the great changes in the city, it sent two elite soldiers to investigate the situation.

name: Click On Bells Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ spanners in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Hard

name: Tomb nightmares
description: One excerpt from the adventure story of two treasure seekers. Explore the mysterious dungeon, pass all the tests and get out alive! The catacombs full of mysteries are waiting for you!

name: Lost Souls
description: Lost souls is a short first-person indie horror game where you solve puzzles, encounter creepy scares, and uncover the tragedy that befell your family, all in a sinister yet compelling atmosphere which traps you in the home of the Ambrus.

name: Master Level Maker
description: Make an interesting map by yourself and share it with the world，freedom 2d platform game。The game includes a wide variety of props and items, and players can even create their own material packs. There are also triggers that can be used to create even more exciting levels.

name: Clossure
description: I know, it should be one "s". I don't mind. In a surreal and mysterious world, a piece of heaven fell onto a hill below the sky. Since that day, none have seen the top of that hill, even though all have longed to. You intend to change that... don't you? This is a top down pixel art rpg.

name: Bullet Rain
description: This Game is a classic First Person Shooter. As it is still in development features and weapons will be added step by step. We hope you will enjoy our work!

name: Secrets of the Heartbeat
description: Confronted with life's peak, diverse romance beckons. Do you choose the allure of a charming secretary or the wisdom of an independent yoga instructor? Will you pursue distant celebrities or seek the sincerity of a working girl's love? Each choice shapes your journey.

name: Miko Sniper
description: Sakura Miko and 35P are ready for battle! Miko Sniper is a chaotic shooting game where you get to shoot, burn and explode your enemies!

name: Heroes Stand Tall: M.E.T.A
description: "Heroes Stand Tall: M.E.T.A" thrusts you into the heart of the immersive Digiverse. In the HST Arena, players engage in intense PvP deathmatches, wielding diverse weapons as Heroes. Victory requires strategic prowess and precise aim. Embrace the M.E.T.A, Be A Hero and Stand Tall.

name: Ancients Unleashed
description: Immerse yourself in a relentless battleground of mythical hordes, divine chaos and epic landscapes. Challenge heroes to gain skills, hone divine powers and take your seat as a god. Will you rise to the occasion, chosen one? Your odyssey has only just begun.

name: Ells Tales: Egg
description: Welcome to the survival horror clicker! Try to save a chicken egg and at the same time your life.

name: Hero vs. 1000
description: Experience the adrenaline of facing countless hordes of enemies in an unparalleled challenge! Command a knight, a pirate and a soldier in epic battles, each with 1000 opponents waiting to test your courage and skill.

name: Furry Orgy
description: Furry Orgy is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Lost Light: Bright mates
description: "The object, becoming a light that dispels darkness, will shine as a hope to illuminate the world." Yes, that's a light bulb. A hard action adventure game where a brave light bulb overcomes shadows with its gleaming and daring rolls, aiming for an electric lamp.

name: Hentai City
description: Hentai City is a relaxing game with multiple sexy girls.This is a game of finding similar images, with a gentle, simple arcade style.

name: Sexy Beats
description: 《Sexy Beats 》is a music game that will leave you wanting more, just hit the notes accurately and the girl will swing her body to the music.

name: Werewolf Party
description: Test your deception skills in this thrilling first-person multiplayer game. Play with 4-11 people, taking on diverse roles—from a cunning werewolf to an observant villager, each equipped with unique powers. Pay attention to detail, listen for vocal cues, and use your perception to win.

name: Counter Force: Tactical Warfare
description: Are you ready to save the world from bad guys?

name: SkateLab
description: A 100% physics-driven skateboarding sandbox. Experiment in a world with unconstrained physics, create spots, record clips, and skate online with your friends.

name: A Game's Tale
description: Welcome to "A Game's Tale”, where you´ll enjoy tactical battles, grow your deck as you travel through a fantasy world. While meeting charming characters along the way, you will discover the secret of why we play.

name: Oops! Zombie Swarm
description: An unknown virus has turned most people into zombies. In this disaster, you unexpectedly discover a mysterious dragon egg, which seems to grant you immunity to the virus. Now, your mission is to protect this precious dragon egg and ensure it is not destroyed by hordes of zombies.

name: Breed Kim Il-Sung
description: With millions of men dead as a result of the Korean War, the Dear Leader needs YOU to help rebuild the glorious DPRK in this action-roguelike FPS. Liquidate capitalist agitators to earn veneration from the Kims and ensure their bloodline perseveres to see a future free from imperialist aggression!

name: Hitting Balls
description: Hitting balls - a jaw-dropping arena action game with realistic physics and destructible elements. Roll balls with your friends. Many interesting levels and weapons will not let you get bored!

name: SER: Into The Void
description: SER: Into The Void is a roguelite RPG game. Join The Void Foundation. Fight all kinds of strange monsters and study them. Serve humanity in a future where history is rewritten and magic and technology are combined.

name: Coastal Defense
description: Coastal Defense is a replayable top-down tower defense game inspired by real-world coastal defense structures. Buy and upgrade your coastal defenses to defeat incoming navies!

name: Acorn Hunt
description: A cute, time-based, acorn-moving puzzle game filled with charm. Take control of Skylar Squirrel and get your acorn home fastest.

name: Imitosis
description: An experimental 5-minute visual novel. A security concern demands your attention.

name: Moved Mind
description: Moved mind is a first person narrative psychological horror game, where you will be the subject of a psychological experiment where you will have to face your fears and differentiate reality from the symptoms of your illness.

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks: Paris
description: A unique musical hidden object game where you search the streets of Paris for singing kittens from a choir and money bags to hire and assemble a cat band. As orchestra conductor, you'll be able to configure the musicians as you wish, creating your own music and choir melodies. Find them all!

name: Cross Impact: V1
description: Download and play V1 from ULTRAKILL in Cross Impact!

name: Uncle Z
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse with friends, managing resources, facing infected, and caring for your elderly uncle. Explore strategies, action, and chaos in a post-pandemic world. Challenge yourself in a unique survival game.

name: Ghost Janitors
description: Ghost Janitors is a multiplayer psychological horror game for 1-4 players. Your job? Cleaning haunted houses while avoiding terrifying monsters. Ready to face the spine-tingling challenge with your team?

name: Bring Me that Shawarma
description: A visual novel about shawarma, consisting of multiple episodes.

name: The Lost Detective
description: This is a single-player third-person action-adventure puzzle game that allows players to solve certain puzzles and explore more game content. This game currently only supports computers and can be operated through a keyboard and mouse.

name: No Recollection
description: A mystery visual novel following a boy who awoke in a strange building, with no recollection of where he is, how he arrived, why he's here, or how to leave. Discover the answers to these mysteries as you search for a way out. Meet a small but colorful cast in your journey, and escape together!

name: Hidden Cats In Street Market
description: This is a casual and relaxing hidden object game. Find cute cats in the street market. Can you find them? Meow Meow！Let's start near the fruit stall!

name: Alice in the Nightmare Land
description: This is an escape adventure game. Within a building full of traps and mechanisms, your goal is to find the exit. Players will play as Alice, navigating through sealed rooms using click-based interactions to find items and solve the mechanisms to advance to the next stage.

name: Honey's Sweet Revenge
description: Honey's Sweet Revenge is a metroidvania with mechanics inspired by platform fighters. Customize your item loadout and defeat enemies and bosses.

name: Long Way
description: Long Way is an immersive arcade driving simulator with diverse vehicles and customization. Driving different type of vehicles with trailers, various landscapes, and weather conditions. Impressive graphics, dynamic time, and challenges enhance immersion. Multiplayer support for up to 8 friends.

name: Forgotten Lectures: Fall of a Dynasty - The Beginning
description: Humanity went out to the stars and conquered a significant portion of the known galaxy. While technology advanced society did not necessarily. Greed, the struggle for power and influence is stronger than ever before and while besieged from outside forces there’s no lack of internal strife.

name: Abyssal Descent
description: Embark on an epic platforming adventure through treacherous caves and mysterious realms in Abyssal Descent. Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock hidden secrets as you journey through procedurally generated underground worlds. With optional local co-op, share this adventure with a friend.

name: Winnie-the-Pooh: Realm of Torment
description: Tricked by Winnie-the-Pooh, you must navigate a twisted maze filled with psychological tricks, demons, and sadistic challenges. Outsmart your tormentor, solve puzzles, and survive his pursuit. Reclaim your soul through multiple endings. Can you escape the clutches of this diabolical bear?

name: Simpler Times
description: Simpler Times is an experiential, interactive meditation that rewards patience and attention with poignant moments that can be replayed like a favorite song.

name: Crackin' Smackin
description: A chaotic stoneage arena brawler with destructible levels for up to 8 players. Customize your character and jump into action!

name: Bodycam
description: Bodycam is an ultra-realistic multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using the latest technologies of the next-gen game engine Unreal Engine 5. Get ready to dive into fast-paced Bodycam actions, where every bullet counts and every choice can decide over the victory or loss of your team.

name: Forgotten Seas
description: Craft a 'Ship in a Bottle' and set sail! You are lost in a Bermuda Triangle void. Land is scarce, and the ocean is treacherous. Dread Pirates rule the seas. Experience a survival adventure filled with sailing, plundering, base-building, crafting, treasure hunting, trading, and Pirate Ship combat.

name: Kami-sama's Personal Servant
description: The story of the relationship between a god and a young sacrificed boy, Kami-sama's Personal Servant. A mysterious fukichi na kami (god who brought bad luck) with a mysterious past who lived in the mountains and an orphan boy who was a descendant of an outsider and had been chosen as a sacrifice. What would happen between them?

name: Star Stuff
description: Star Stuff is a puzzle automation game that mixes bot programming with real time shenanigans. Play as Mija (me-ha), a cosmic employee on their first day at a star factory. Automate bots, interact in real time with bot actions to solve mind-bending puzzles, and save the ever-expanding universe while you're at it!

name: Uber Destruction
description: Uber Destruction is a 2D fast-pace side-scrolling roguelike featuring intense battles with immense hoards of enemies, scaling difficulty, an arsenal of weaponry, and a variety of obtainable upgrades. Take the wheel and drive through the bullet hell madness!

name: Gemini: Binary Conflict
description: ‘Gemini: Binary Conflict’ is a multiplayer, class based, first person shooter set in the midst of an interplanetary war. With exotic environments and a bold visual style, the game provides a subtle mixture of mechanics both familiar and unusual to create a unique and engaging gameplay experience.

name: Empires of the Undergrowth
description:
Lead your Ant Colony to Dominance!

Empires of the Undergrowth is an ant colony management game, in a fast-paced real-time strategy style. The player excavates their nest underground, constructing tunnels and chambers to store food and raise brood. On the surface, the ants claim territory, gather resources, overwhelm fearsome arachnids and clash with other colonies. Nest design, army size, composition and attack timing are key to securing victory.

Missions are narrated from the perspective of a documentary film maker studying the ants, who offers intelligent insight into the goings-on of the colony and the undergrowth beyond. The primary game mode in early access is Formicarium, where you take ownership of a home colony of unique DNA-harvesting ants as they work to assimilate the desirable traits of their foes. You can upgrade them by playing one-off missions, sometimes with your home colony and sometimes with other ant species.

name: Touhou Spell Carnival: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
- Reimu and Marisa Figures
- Official Hardcover Art Book (56 Pages)
- Official Soundtrack (52 Tracks)
- Reversible Cover Sleeve
- Collector's Box
- Exclusive Trading Card

name: Yogoe Hunter
description:
Embark on a roguelike text adventure game journey through Eastern legends!
Intense battles with mythical creatures recorded in history and a variety of choices leading to multiple endings await you.

name: Classified: France '44 - Season Pass Upgrade Pack
description:
The Season Pass Upgrade Pack contains:

DLC 2 - Agent Pack
DLC 3 - Talon Pack
DLC 4 - Devils Pack

Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations

name: Brawl Stars: CyberBrawl
description: Sin descripción

name: UEFA Euro 2024
description: The squads are set, and the competition is ready — including you. Lead your team against the best and chase international glory as Europe’s greatest teams compete for the UEFA EURO 2024 title. Feel the excitement and unpredictability of this iconic tournament, and make your mark on football history. The full UEFA EURO 2024 experience arrives in EA SPORTS FC 24 as a post-launch update, at no extra cost.

name: BattleCore Arena: Founder's Pack
description: Get access to an exclusive Core appearance, banner background and symbol, a title, and one season pass token with the Founders Pack. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: BattleCore Arena: Premium Founders Pack
description: Get access to the content of the Founders Pack along with an emote, a title, and one additional season pass token. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Operation Mountain Breeze by Sandman Simulations
description: In the fall of 2015, the battles of the Syrian Civil War between the rebels and the Syrian government forces continue intensely. The involvement of several foreign powers, ISIS, and Hezbollah in the conflicts further escalates tensions.

name: Classified: France '44 - Talon
description:
Hit the enemy where it hurts with new missions and a brand new map in the Talon Pack, with new equipment for the US Airbourne.

The Talon Pack contains:
New Map – “Manor”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Foul Manors
• Hostage Negotiation
New Weapon:
• Mosin-Nagant M1891
New Weapon Variant:
• Trench Gun “Bear”
New Clothing Set
• US Airbourne “Talon” Set

name: BattleCore Arena: Kaps Pack
description: Unlock the entire appearance of Kaps for your core and banner, along with 2,200 Battlecoins to use in BattleCore Arena on boosts and cosmetics. This offer can only be purchased once.

name: Land of the Vikings: Dage Island
description: Dage Island is a new map for "Land of the Vikings". The map is a new island with a mountainous terrain, providing players with new ways to build their Viking settlements.

name: Tour de France 2024: Cycling Kit Pack
description: Experience all the action of the Tour de France 2024 with the official game

name: Anna's Monster Farm: Begins
description: Sin descripción

name: EyeOS
description: A short (and borderline nonsensical) mystery game where you are trying to find out what happened to your missing friend by rooting around in their computer. Play by clicking on things and searching terms in the EyeOS home screen!

name: Missing Picture
description: Missing Picture is a short mystery-detective game, where you figure out what happened to three missing teenagers in the deep and dark forests of Sweden

name: We Like It Here
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Madrid
description: Sim-wings presents the Airport Madrid with all buildings and service facilities for X-Plane. The aerial image covers a total surface of 400 km², and the detailed 3D models and animations bring the scenery to life.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Delta Replica"
description: Cool Scarlet Delta costumes are newly available for Yohane!

name: Ginka: After
description:
A new item was added to the title screen with the recent version 1.06 update!
- Scenario
- Event CG
- A few newly recorded voiceovers have been added

name: Greedy Goose
description: You play as a brave goose who has decided to embark on an exciting journey. Your goal is to reach the end of the level, collecting as many coins as possible.

name: FantasyKingdom
description: FantasyKingdom is an exciting hidden object 3D puzzle game in a fantasy-medieval setting. There are many items on the location, like numerous trading tents, fortress walls, village houses and other medieval decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Simulacrum
description: Simulacrum is a set of 32 maps in MBF21 format by @muumi and @myolden. This set starts modestly but steadily climbs into challenge and slaughter territory in the later maps.

name: Construction Simulator: Titanium Edition
description: The Construction Simulator - Titanium Edition is your perfect entry into the fascinating world of construction and heavy machinery.

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 8
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters. Tony and his two assistants head to a meeting downtown, determined to secure a new office space for the company. Will they find a way to sway the current owner in their favor?

name: Our Field Trip Adventure + More Missions Pack Set
description: Sin descripción
